articles.content:
Ethiopian President Supports Cause of DPRK Government and People 
    Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Ethiopian President Girma Woldegiorgis stated that his government would positively support the just cause of the
DPRK government and people in the future.
 When receiving credentials from DPRK Ambassador e. p. to Ethiopia O Ul Rok on September 29, he said his government hoped for further expansion and development of the relations between the two countries.

articles.title: WPK Founding Anniversary Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Mongolian Party Leader Calls for Peaceful Reunification of Korea 
    Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- D. Idevkhten, general secretary of the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party, said he hoped for the stabilization of the situation on the Korean peninsula and the peaceful reunification of Korea.
 When DPRK Ambassador to Mongolia Pak Jong Do paid him a courtesy call on September 29, the general secretary said he would make active efforts for the development of the friendly relations between the Mongolian People's Revolutionary Party and the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.content:
Greetings to German President 
    Pyongyang, October 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greetings to German President Horst Kohler on the national day of the Federal Republic of Germany.
 Wishing the German people prosperity and welfare, the message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow in scope and develop in various fields.
